spec_data.Name: clipper-devel
spec_data.Description:
the clipper-devel package contains the header files and libraries
necessary for developing programs using the clipper C++
crystallographic library.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 01:58:42 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Libraries and header files for clipper development
